mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Employee (emp_no, nm, password, email, birth_dt, enter_dt, retire_dt, dept_cd, team_cd, grade_cd, posit_cd, phone_no, addr) VALUES (#{empNo}, sha2(concat(#{password}, #{salt}), 256), #{email}, #{recommendFlag}, #{salt})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE id = #{empNo} AND password = sha2(concat(#{password}, (SELECT salt FROM Employee WHERE id = #{empNo})), 256)
